summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 27, 2019, showing staff assignments and posts for various shifts. The document appears to be a routine prison staffing schedule.

persons.name: Melendez
persons.context: Listed on the roster under 'STAFF SEARCH' section, appears to be a correctional officer or staff member assigned to duties at MCC New York.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Assignments
events.description: Routine daily assignment of prison staff to various posts and shifts at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated July 27, 2019.
The roster shows various prison posts and shifts including control rooms, housing units, special housing units (SHU), visitation, and sanitation.
Staff member 'Melendez' is listed under the 'STAFF SEARCH' section of the roster.
The document appears to be a routine administrative record of prison staffing assignments.
